Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.http.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonBodyPublishers
    Creates instances if HttpRequest.BodyPublisher for more comfort work
    HttpGetCachedCookiesSupplier
    This class is designed to build chains of functions that get applicable cookies from a cookie cache for the specified uri in the request header. from http client.
    HttpRequestGetSupplier<T extends HttpRequestGetSupplier<T>>
    It builds a function that prepare a HttpRequest to get a response further.
    HttpRequestGetSupplier.DeleteHttpRequestSupplier  
    HttpRequestGetSupplier.GetHttpRequestSupplier  
    HttpRequestGetSupplier.MethodHttpRequestSupplier  
    HttpRequestGetSupplier.PostHttpRequestSupplier  
    HttpRequestGetSupplier.PutHttpRequestSupplier  
    HttpResponseInfoSequentialGetSupplier<T>
    This class is designed to build chains of functions that get needed data from a http response.
    HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier<T,​R extends HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier<T,​R>>
    This class is designed to build chains of functions that get a response when a request is sent.
    HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier.HttpResponseOnConditionSequentialGetSupplier<T>
    This class is designed to allow a user to get responses using specific conditions via HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier.HttpResponseOnConditionSequentialGetSupplier.conditionToReceiveDesiredResponse(Predicate) and HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier.HttpResponseOnConditionSequentialGetSupplier.timeToReceiveDesiredResponse(Duration)
    HttpResponseSequentialGetSupplier.HttpResponseSimpleSequentialGetSupplier<T>  
    HttpSteps  
    HttpStepsParameterProvider
